department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: This Request for Standing Offers (RFSO) on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard is a procurement of type-approved heading systems/equipment for Canadian government use. The procurement requests the provision of goods as and when required by departments of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) from Time of need.
description: The present request for standing offers specifies the shipping of " navigational equipment and instruments" items. the goods are to be delivered to BC, ONT, NS, NWT, QC, and NL.
